column1: Little Goat Diner////First time visit little goat this Friday was because girl and the goat need to wait over 3 hours however little goat only need to wait like 40 mins...tried shrimp and grit+duck chest and other sneak of fried onion. Have to said duck chest is awesome!! Very tender yet have crispy crust
column2: with Vigi in the bottom. It's wonderful! On the contrary
column3: shrimp and grit is a little too sour because tons of tomato and cheese! In the fist 10 mins I thought it's amazing! Very testy! Yet I can not finish the bowl in the end...
